description.title: Official Dealer Center for the sale and maintenance of Lexus cars.
description.text:
The building of the new dealer center was built and opened in 2013. The building is divided into 3 parts: an exhibition hall, office premises, and a mechanical service station.

We are proud to say that XTF participated in project management in this project, and a full set of structural documentation was developed by our specialists: geological engineering and pile field design, foundations, steel frame, reinforced concrete floors design, mechanical equipment installation, facade systems design, etc.

description.title: Official Dealer Center for the sale and maintenance of Toyota cars.
description.text:
The building of the new dealer center was built and opened in 2008. The building is divided into 3 parts: an exhibition hall, office premises, and a mechanical service station.

Team of engineers that later found XTF developed a full set of structural documentation: geological engineering and pile field design, foundations, steel frame, reinforced concrete floors design, mechanical equipment installation, facade systems design, etc.

description.title: Supermarket "Magnet"
description.text:
